artist: Silversmith: Sebastian Henry Garrard; Retailer: Garrard & Co.
creditline: Gift of Jan and Bill Spoor
description: square body with clipped corners; larger side panels decorated with hunters with bows and spears; two larger panels have birds; corner panels decorated with flowers; top has flowers and birds; wood insert in cover
markings: on bottom, stamped: [SG (rampant lion)]; on one corner panel, stamped: [SG (rampant lion) (cat\'s head) O]
object_name: Flask with screw top, from a toilette set
title: Flask with screw top, from a toilette set
